document.full_text: the arts council england said on wednesday it would stop funding over 200 arts organizations as part of broader public sector cuts being enforced by the government in its battle to bring down a record budget deficit.
document.title: axe falls on uk arts groups as cuts announced
lines_and_colors: the arts council england said on wednesday it would stop funding over 200 arts organizations as part of broader public sector cuts being enforced by the government in its battle to bring down a record budget deficit.
